Industrial strength plastic spray bottle BPA free for liquids can be used for many of your house cleaning, traveling accessories, essential oil, hairspray and skin care needs including perfume and cologne; a safe plastic water bottle.', 'Designed to last, MoYo Natural Labs 8 oz water bottles that spray mist will save you money and hassle.', 'MoYo Natural Labs spray bottle 8 ounce is ideal as a hair dressing spray bottle and a plastic spray bottle for essential oils, essential skin and body care products.', "OUR PROMISE! We're that confident that you'll love your new 8 ounce body spray bottle and will continue to use MoYo Natural Labs 8 oz containers in the future.", 'CLICK the "Add to Cart" button to order the MoYo Natural Labs spray bottle 8 oz Travel Bottle Set and travel bottle containers. today!']

Product Details: {'Brand': 'MoYo Natural Labs', 'Color': 'Blue', 'Capacity': '8 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '4 x 1.75 x 4 inches', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '4 x 1.75 x 4 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '8OZBLUEFM2PACK', 'UPC': '641938711219', 'Manufacturer': 'MoYo Natural Labs'}
Review Text: This set of fine misters is absolutely perfect for making room sprays, scented toners, and other things with my favorite essential oils. After giving birth, I made a witch hazel spray for healing, I made a tea tree toner to soothe skin during breakouts, and I made a room spray with lavender and eucalyptus to keep in the room with the diaper changers. It's great that this comes in a set of three and that the sprayers put out a fine mist rather than a thick set of droplets. I also really like the cobalt blue color. Though I received a sample for review, the positive opinion is my own.
Review Title: What you see is what you get, a great set for essential oil fans
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Savanaahs Organic Argan Oil 4 Oz / 120 ML 100% Pure & Cold Pressed - Premium Grade - USDA Certified Organic - Large 4 Oz Glass Bottle - Excellent Natural Multi-Purpose Moisturizer for Skin, Hair & Nails - Non-Greasy and Fast Absorbing - Good Source of Vitamin E & Omegas - Rejuvenates Dry Skin - 100% Satisfaction Guarantee - 90 Days Full Refund/ Return Policy (No Questions Asked) - New Design & Packaging - Promotional Price for Limited Time Only LPVLUX {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.2 x 4.8 x 2.3 inches; 8.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': '4 OZ / 120 ML', 'UPC': '661799831734 885133330916', 'Manufacturer': 'Divine Organics'} I’ve tried other brands of argan oil, and have been surprised that some of the brands almost seem more like canola oil or a neutral oil, to where I almost wondered if some of them are counterfeit. Not so with this brand. This brand has the natural scent of the real deal, and is effective to boot. I have a baby, so have been washing my hands about 10 times a day, every time I change his diaper. Between that and all of the diaper wipes I use, my hands have been starting to peel and crack, so I knew I needed a solution.

This argan oil came with a regular lid, an eyedropper, and a pump dispenser. I used the pump dispenser and set it right next to my faucet so I could get a quick pump of oil every time I wash my hands. Well, it only took a couple of days to experience really great results. My hands feel normal again, and I am so relieved. From hard skin that was rough and crackled, to soft, happy hands again.

I have also used the product on my split ends, and here, I’d like to caution you that only a few drops are needed. It is very effective and soaks and well, so you only need a very small amount.

Overall, this argan oil is one of the best I have found. It comes packaged beautifully and looks like a gift, has multiple options for how you dispense it, and is pure, organic, and has the mild scent of real argan oil, unlike some competitors. A fantastic product at a fantastic price OZNaturals Facial Mask - This Moisturizing Face Mask Contains Rosehip Oil, Pro Vitamin B5 & Amino Acids - This Anti Aging Mask Deeply Hydrates Dry Skin For A Healthy Youthful Glow! Auperwel ["POWERHOUSE FORMULATION includes Rosehip Oil Pro-Vitamin B5 Amino Acid Complex and an Herbal Blend that deeply nourishes and refreshes aging skin like no other face mask on the market;MOISTURIZING FACE MASK gives effective hydration to dry dull skin Ã‚Â\xa0Natural and active ingredients including hyaluronic acid and Vitamin E leave skin hydrated radiant and more youthful looking;USING THE HIGHEST concentration of natural and active ingredients possible Never compromising on quality and performance Our goal is to give you beautiful skin in eco-friendly ways Fragrance-free;DEEPLY HYDRATING facial mask delivers moisture directly to the skin and helps calm dry skin irritation Ã‚Â\xa0Gentle enough for use every day it will become your favorite weapon against dry skin;Satisfaction Guaranteed Unconditional 30-Day Return And Refund Policy Ensures You'll Be Delighted Or Your Money Back Developed By Renowned Aesthetician Angela Irish - For All Skin Types"] {'Brand': 'Auperwel', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 1 inches; 4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'GN-15Q6-JVWK', 'UPC': '616806598469', 'Manufacturer': 'Oz Naturals'} I had previously been using Lush's Mask of Magnaminty and had really been enjoying it, however I think I was ready for a little bit more of a "grown-up" facial mask to help reduce the appearance of some of the fine lines I have developed in the year since having my son.

I have gotten to use this facemask twice and have been super impressed with the results. I am also using the retinol facial moisturizer as well as an ocean mineral toner and cleanser from this brand, and while I was seeing great results from the other products, this mask really supercharged the results. I look like I have had a full nights sleep, which I can assure you I have not! It plumped up some of my wrinkles and just gave my face that dewy fresh appearance that I remember having in my 20s.

I received samples of these products to test, but I can't argue with the results. I will certainly be purchasing more from this line. profile:
The user maintains a strong preference for high-quality, organic skincare products that effectively target specific skin needs, particularly in the areas of repair and moisture retention. They recently emphasized their interest in products that combine natural ingredients for enhanced hydration and anti-aging benefits, as demonstrated by their positive experiences with nourishing skincare items. 

Their commitment to functionality extends to practical and versatile packaging, which is important in a household with a baby. The user appreciates products that are eco-friendly and BPA-free, as reflected in their recent purchase of refillable spray bottles for making customized skincare remedies, including healing toners and room sprays.

Authenticity remains a significant value, guiding the user’s discerning approach to skincare. They are sensitive to fragrance, opting for mild and natural aromas, and prioritize effective performance and value for money, often expecting noticeable results within a short timeframe. 

Their reviews highlight a focus on organic authenticity, functional design, and visible efficacy in skincare choices, with a consistent search for products that provide nourishing care and rejuvenation. Overall, the user balances a dedication to high-quality materials with a practical approach, ensuring that their product selections also cater to their lifestyle needs, including the use of essential oils and homemade skincare solutions.
